directions: Combine pumpkin, sugar, cinnamon sticks, and cloves in a large pot over low heat. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until pumpkin is very soft, about 30 minutes. Mix in coconut and remove from heat. Mash large pumpkin pieces with a potato mash, or leave them slightly chunky. Let cool for 10 minutes.
Transfer  to a container with a lid and refrigerate.
ingredients: 1 (2 pound) fresh pumpkin, peeled and cut into 1-inch chunks
title: Easy Brazilian Pumpkin Coconut Dessert with Few Ingredients
